[Unbalancing Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=6143) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Finisher" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=802" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You attack with a flashy assault that leaves your target off balance. Make a melee Strike. If you hit and deal damage, the target is [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) until the end of your next turn.
